alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Watch issued January 05 at 7:21AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE COLORADO AVALANCHE INFORMATION CENTER. * WHAT...Heavy snow and strong winds through Thursday will result in large natural avalanches especially on easterly slopes near ridgetop. Human-triggered avalanches likely. * WHERE... CAIC Forecast Zone of Steaboat and Flat Tops including the Park Range, Elkhead Mountains, and Flat Tops. * WHEN... High (level 4 of 5) avalance danger on Thursday. * IMPACTS... Avalanches will run natually and can be easily triggered that are large enough to bury a person. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Avoid avalanche terrain. Stay up to date with changing conditions at Colorado.gov/avalance JK

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet
